resources.string: Simple wallpaper correlating time and color.
Simple, yet useful, wallpaper the correlates color and time.
Show second hand on reference clock.
Select hour, minute or seconds to track by color.

Solid Chronochrome™ combines time and color to create a simple utilitarian wallpaper. Chronochrome™ which is a term meaning Time-Color, was created as an experiment in synesthesia ― Can we become so accustomed to associating time with color that it becomes second nature? Instead of asking, "What time is it?", might we one day ask, "What color is it?"
